Who-I-Am.headline: Who I Am
Who-I-Am.personal-description: Hey there I'm Raphael! Motivated Frontend Developer with a solid foundation in modern web technologies and roven skills in Windows system administration. I am highly motivated and looking for new challenges.
Who-I-Am.location: Based in Ulm (Donau). Open to on-site work or remote and willing to contribute to collaboration
Who-I-Am.mindset: As a determined, disciplined and highly motivated young professional, I am completely open to learning new technologies. My ultimate goal is to continuously expand my skills and develop innovative, efficient solutions through my commitment.
Who-I-Am.approach: My basic approach is pragmatic: I always break down a large problem into many small, manageable units. This enables me to analyse it clearly and develop solutions step by step.

technologies.headline: Skill Set
technologies.description: I have a solid foundation in front-end development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Firebase, and Material Design, complemented by knowledge of REST APIs, Git, and Scrum. I enjoy creating user-friendly, responsive interfaces and am eager to keep learning of new tools to stay efficient in the fast-evolving web environment.
technologies.description-2: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.headline: Featured Projects
portfolio.description-1: Explore a selection of my work here -
portfolio.description-2: Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

others-about-me.headline: What my colleagus and employers say about me

0.text: We valued Mr. Zwick as a thoroughly reliable and conscientious employee who approached all assigned tasks with great diligence and professional care.

1.text: A reliable team player with a professional and diplomatic communication style. He solves problems proactively and contributes to a positive team spirit, even under pressure, by focusing on collaborative and efficient solutions.

2.text: Raphael was a reliable partner in our Kanban project, focusing on structured front-end development (HTML/CSS/JS) with additional back-end support. He worked with great commitment and ensured a professional, personable collaboration on equal terms.

contact-me.headline: Contact me
contact-me.description: My aim is not only to implement projects through well-thought-out architecture and user-centred innovation, but also to enrich them in a sustainable way.

description.Join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
description.El Pollo Loco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
